description: Detects the suspicious file that is created from PoC code against Windows Print Spooler Remote Code Execution Vulnerability CVE-2021-34527 (PrinterNightmare), CVE-2021-1675 . Author: Sittikorn S, Nuttakorn T, Tim Shelton. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Antivirus PrinterNightmare CVE-2021-34527 Exploit Detection
query: (Filename:*C\:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\x64\\* AND (NOT (*File\ submitted\ to\ Symantec\ for\ analysis*)))
